name: gappy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with some teeth missing or with spaces between the teeth: gappy smile/grin Her face was sweet, with a joyful, gappy smile/grin.gappy teeth I think his gappy teeth are cute.
with some holes or spaces: The hedge has become gappy. gappy floorboards
with some parts missing or not included; not complete: The law is a little gappy in this area.
More examplesFewer examplesHe gave me a gappy grin.I was a social misfit, with thick spectacles and gappy teeth.The kids are so cute with their gappy smiles and freckled faces. The shrubs have gappy growth at the top.He could see through the gappy fence.They provided an entertaining, if rather gappy, history of computing.
